extendedInfo.description: Simple clock wallpaper with current day of week, date, WiFi network name and battery status. Minimal memory and battery consumption. More options will be added eventually without any Ads or 'premium only' version.*OK, I was contacted by a few companies willing place the Ads in the app despite the description. There is how you do it.You will need:â¢ an Android based phone;â¢ a pen;â¢ a PostItÂ® paper sheet.Please follow these steps carefully:1. Get a pen with the right hand and a PostItÂ® paper sheet with the left one. You might find it more comfortable to swap ands if you are left-handed.2. Write your Ad text on the PostItÂ® paper sheet using the pen.3. Put the pen away.4. Take a phone with a free hand.5. Glue PostItÂ® sheet to a phone screen.That's all! Now you have your Ads placed! It works even when the screen is off, and you can update the ads from time to time.Cheers!

reviews.title: Nice and Light.
reviews.comment: It would be cool if the default position of the clock would be below the persistent Google Search bar or let us choose the position of the clock.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Great app. Lighter on resources than any widget. Any chance wifi status could be hidden when off. N/A doesn\'t look very pretty on my home screen all day. Same with battery % Thanks :)
reviews.author: Matt Blackley

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: awesome update. need more. custom fonts would be awesome too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Very neat..and informative.batt life showing infront.
reviews.author: A Google User
